extendedInfo.description: Play as a fire-breathing dragon who sleeps on gold and kidnaps princesses for fun!Choice of the Dragon is a free text-based game of multiple choice.  Dominate the local kingdom, loot and pillage, and inspire terror in the hearts of your enemies!

reviews.title: Well-written and fun
reviews.comment: Clever, witty and a lot of fun to play. I will definitely recommend it to friends.
reviews.author: Ari Lena

reviews.title: Great piece of interactive fiction
reviews.comment: It\'s written in a light-hearted manner. The form is perfect for mobile - no text commands, only the choices
reviews.author: Oskar \305\232wierad

reviews.title: Wish there was more
reviews.comment: I love this game/story I just wish It didn\'t end so soon or if there was another chapter.I\'ve played through it so many time. That I is lossing it\'s charm please ce out with another dragon one.
reviews.author: Cody Moss

reviews.title: AWESOME-MATE?
reviews.comment: Would rate 5 stars if you could get a mate without doing the story a bajillion times(!)
reviews.author: Madeline McGroty

reviews.title: How do I get a mate?
reviews.comment: Please someone tell me how to get a female mate. I wanted the black serpant but none of the options worked. Is there a easy way to get a mate? Make it easier to get a mate and I\'ll five star you.
reviews.author: Spike Fertar

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome app, I love the humor, but I do wish it were longer. Otherwise, do get this app!
reviews.author: Jesse Raen Francis

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: Its so amazing and fun I van imaging the whole adventure in my head its amazing do very awesome! I love you for making this game!
reviews.author: brittany paige

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I really like how you ARE the dragon and you can choose to \'play nice\' with enemies or just eat them!!
reviews.author: Samantha Davies

reviews.title: it\'s awesome but
reviews.comment: I think this should have more like chapters and not stop at hibernation time but besides that it\'s cool I give 4 stars out of fiver :D
reviews.author: kylah Burchell

reviews.title: unlucky dragon.
reviews.comment: i got near-death injuries, had all my horde stolen, all my attempts at a mate failed, and, to finish up, i got beheaded by an angry godess. but, i love this game!
reviews.author: Kamil Osoba

reviews.title: Would love it to be extended.
reviews.comment: I love this game, it\'s fun and being able to choose what to do is great, especially being able to come up with your own dragon name. The only problem is that it is a bit shory. I would love it if it were extended and maybe even to lot of chapters! Other than that, this game is amazing, especially because I like reading alot, and I\'m sure there are others who do too. P.S. If there is more to the story just that it comes with buying the full version or I just don\'t know about it, please let know in desc.
reviews.author: Ace Roblox

reviews.title: See I am not only one...
reviews.comment: Great game, many possibilities, but I have the same problems as everyone else: mating basically requires max stat and careful choices...never got it. Story needs extension. Anyway, went through no-injury, super wealthy, happy gods, high disdain, honor, and finesse. What did you get?(not bragging, but just to brag about it now, that was only second run.)
reviews.author: FORMINCRAFTIA

reviews.title: Great and awesome
reviews.comment: It is one of the best choice text story games.  For me it is the second best.  It is a great game.  The only problem is that every time I play I can never get a mate for the dragon.
reviews.author: Wynonna Mammel

reviews.title: Nice, but...
reviews.comment: It\'s a fun game (creating a character that ends up as a cunning and brutal battle-scarred dragon god is just inherently fun, I guess), but there\'s some kind of bizarre \"feature\" that forces the player to wait 20 minutes before the game can be replayed. But for that, I\'d give it four stars.
reviews.author: Matthew Shute

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I loved this game! I downloaded it just for something to kill time, and I ended up really enjoying it. The narrative and choices in the game are great. The story itself is genius. The only things I didn\'t like were the 19 min. Wait and that the game was a bit short, I wish it had been split up into chapters. Making a longer quest. But, I do understand why it isn\'t. I truly do recommend this game, fantastic story, great narrative, fun choices and helps get your imagination going.
reviews.author: Chris Doherty

reviews.title: Fun, more trouble than it\'s worth
reviews.comment: Suffered through some glitches that hid the text from me - that was annoying. And I felt that the options were limited at times (maybe I\'m just a picky dragon). It was frustrating having \'my\' desires chosen for me. But that\'s what\'s keeping it from being a five-star! It\'s a great game overall. I loved the creativity and planning that went into each choice and scenario! I had so much fun, and would keep it if it weren\'t for the glitching
reviews.author: Zoa Naramyon

reviews.title: Pure Fun
reviews.comment: It\'s not the most complex story that they\'ve done, but it\'s certainly one of the more entertaining ones. Playing as a cool, calculating dragon was a lot of fun. It\'s a classic CYOA tale that manages to put it\'s own unique spin on things. Of all their games, I think this is the one that doesn\'t need a sequel - it\'s fine as it is, and stands up to the rest of them even though it was one of their first.
reviews.author: Jeff Peterson

reviews.title: Not cool
reviews.comment: Omg i did all the choices to attract a mate and none workes this game makes me dissapointed and enless this is told how to attract them i will rate this poorly for making my dragon lonely!
reviews.author: Sherry JOHNSON

reviews.title: Robert
reviews.comment: This was a great game and it is worth the $5 for the full version. I love it.
reviews.author: Robby Laughlin

reviews.title: Bravo
reviews.comment: Best company ever 5 stars!
reviews.author: Logan Bronowicki
